item.description:
A CRY Fundraiser event. (www.cryamerica.org)

RANGMANCH presents the first ever Kishore Kumar concert in the New England Area !!
"Yeh Shaam Mastani" Remembering the legend - Kishore Kumar

Mark your calenders for this upcoming event where Boston's best musicians pay tribute to the musical genius on his 25th death anniversary.
Join us and relive the maestro's all time favorites from Padosan, Yaarana, Sagar, Namak Halal, Aradhana, Don and many more.

Book your tickets NOW: http://mycity.sulekha.com/yeh-shaam-mastani_event-in_framingham-ma_277662

Visit us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/events/213512178768519/

Tickets:
Regular seating $25
Premium seating $35 (front section, excluding the first two rows)
VIP seating $50
Children 12 and below $15 (Regular seating only, adult pricing applies for VIP and Premium seats)
item.name: Kishore Kumar Concert (Yeh Shaam Mastani)
